name: Mega Robots Championship
description:
The game is in the prototype phase and we would like to validate the idea and the mechanics.

Started as an Undergraduate thesis  but we would like to continue with the development.

We are looking forward to comments, criticism and suggestions about new moves, mechanics, characters and bugs you have found.

Join the discord and speak directly with us: 

Mega Robots Championship Dev https://discord.gg/ZeFrJXCF
